forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Low around 53, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. West northwest wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 64. Northwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the night envelops Downtown San Francisco, a gentle clarity descends, carrying with it the promise of an enchanting dawn. The temperatures waver around the mid-fifties, offering a mild embrace as the west-northwest wind whispers through the city streets. This evening, the skies remain mostly clear, drawing a veil of serenity across the horizon, inviting quiet reflections beneath the stars.

Tomorrow, the sun will awaken with brilliance, illuminating the urban landscape with a high near sixty-four. The day promises a cheerful embrace, unmarred by the fog that often drapes the city's landmarks. For this inch of time, light layers will suffice—perhaps a soft cardigan, paired with a comfortable pair of slacks, ready to venture into the world. Given the pleasant weather, a leisurely stroll through the verdant expanses of Golden Gate Park could elevate one’s spirits or perhaps a quiet moment at a local café, absorbing the rhythm of the city as it stirs awake. Whatever your choice, embrace these moments as the city reveals its charm, painted by the brush of a gentle autumn day.
